item.title: NostraDavid's Knowledge Base - Javascript code snippets and regex
item.description: For now (2020-07-16) it’s just snippets of JS and regex that I use every now and then I’d use GitHub for that, but I have a tendency to forget GitHub Gist existsâ€¦ Open all chapters Close all chapters Online Tools These are websites/webpages that I use to optimize this site. Tool name What to use it for SVGOMG! “SVG Optimizer’s Missing GUI”, an online SVG optimizer Google’s Closure Compiler A Javascript optimizer - turns modern JS into highly optimized, yet compatible, Javascript.
